String.string: Find Olivung on the Island of Dawn.
Obtain a Cruel Fimbrilisk's Durignite and deliver it to Olivung.
Taste the Magma Ice Cream. [Press key to open your inventory, and select the Magma Ice Cream.]
Obtain the second piece of the Aspiration Stone.
Speak with Olivung at the Southern Checkpoint.
Use the second piece of the Aspiration Stone to empower the Eternal Crown. [Press key to open your inventory, and select the Aspiration Stone - Second Piece.]
Speak with Olivung at the Southern Checkpoint.
